entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.IO.FileSystem.Watcher.Tests failed for File_Create_Tests, Directory_Move_Tests, and Directory_NotifyFilter_Tests #104269
  • UnsafeAccessor throws MissingFieldException on generic types #104268
  • ILLink should build type info after custom steps run for a type #104266
    9.0.0
  • Failed test: JIT/SIMD/LdfldGeneric_ro/LdfldGeneric_ro (arm64) #104263
  • [API Proposal]: LdapSessionOptions.CaCertificates Property #104260
  • Dump file not created when process crashes #104256
  • Dotnet Android broken debugging (and runtime?) #104265
  • Stack allocated boxes end up address exposed #104250
  • MethodTable::IsClassInited returns false for <PrivateImplementationDetails> class #104247
  • DEBUGGING IS NOT ENABLED when trying to debug .NET 8 Blazor Web project simulating iOS device on edge #104234
  • Potential improvements for System.Numerics.Complex #104233
  • Matrix4x4IndexerGetTest and Matrix4x4IndexerSetTest failing on native AOT arm64 #104232
  • JsonPolymorphicAttribute.IgnoreUnrecognizedTypeDiscriminators doesn't handle "no discriminator" use case #104228
    Future
  • Assertion failed under System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.CheckDefaultProvider #104221
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Tests.GCTests.KeepAlive_Null #104218
  • System.Resources.Extensions.Tests resource re-generation is broken after BinaryFormatter extrication #104216

Closed

  • System.FieldAccessException: Cannot set initonly static field #104242
  • Runtime tests fail to AOT compile on Apple mobile platforms #103982
    9.0.0
  • Test failure Interop/PInvoke/CriticalHandles/ReverseTest/ReverseTest/ReverseTest.cmd #94392
  • Test failure: GC\\LargeMemory\\API\\gc\\gettotalmemory\\gettotalmemory.cmd #100053
  • .NET web site is down #104230
  • [7.0] Wasm-tools fails to build because it calls GetTempFileName and runs out of temporary files #95933
  • event handle leak issue of using ConcurrentDictionary in .net8.0 in win10 #102969
  • Use `SearchValues<string>` in Regex #85693
    9.0.0
  • .NET 6 Application fails after windows updates with Hostpolicy.dll missing #101231
  • System.Numerics.Tests.op_rightshiftTest.LargeNegativeBigIntegerShiftTest #102087
  • Access to the path 'c:\temp\filename' is denied #98796
  • [API Proposal]: GC.WaitForPendingFinalizersAsync #104101
  • JIT: Support object stack allocation #11192
    Future
  • Add support for `ISpanFormattable` in `StringBuilder.Append(Object)` #92193
  • High probability of loading an Assembly with no Image #100435
    Future
  • At least packages.microsoft.com has 8.0.7 version #104145
  • Numerical issue when multiply 1.001 by 1000 #104225
  • [release/6.0-staging] Ensure the single-job-per-target-based official build produces all the correct assets #103485
    6.0.x
  • Improve static library publishing #70277
    Future
  • Suboptimal code generated for even a trivial ValueConverter #85570
    9.0.0
  • Jit should avoid allocations for T1 is T2 pattern in generics #58554
    Future
  • Undoing boxing doesn't work with C# 7 pattern matching #10195
    Future
  • JIT: optimizations for multi-use boxes #9118
    Future
  • CLR/JIT should optimize "alloc temporary small object" to "alloc on stack" automatically #4584
    Future
  • [iOS][globalization][icu] Refactor GlobalizationNative_IndexOfNative function #87767
    Future
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization code refactoring #94162
    9.0.0
  • Is it safe to do this volatile++ operation in WebSocketBuffer? #103907
  • [wasm] EmccCompile, and MonoAOTCompiler should explicitly use `IBuildEngine9.ReleaseCores` #95431
    9.0.0
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization throwing exception culture identifier not found when creating culture #95195
    9.0.0
  • Consider to enable FEATURE_MULTICASTSTUB_AS_IL for Windows x86 #103958
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert ILLink's usage of dependency analysis framework #104267
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Don't contain the address for Vector_GetElement on Arm64 #104264
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use double.Hypot in Complex #104262
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Use Math.sinh and Math.cosh in Complex #104261
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • (WIP) Arm64/SVE: Implemented `ConvertToSingle` and `ConvertToDouble` #104259
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • (WIP) Arm64/SVE: Implemented `AddRotateAcross` and `AddSequentialAcross` #104258
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [cdac] Start Loader contract and implement ISOSDacInterface::GetModuleData in cDAC #104257
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Attempt at improving `JsonNode.DeepEquals` numeric equality. #104255
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Detect class inited status more correctly in prestub/jitinterface #104253
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Make randomized string equality comparers implement IAlternateEqualityComparer #104252
    area-System.Collections
  • Add standard tags to HttpClient native trace instrumentation #104251
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/8.0] drop old npm dependencies #104249
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.8
  • Arm64/Sve: Rewrite how ConditionalSelect wraps the embedded mask operations #104248
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arm-sve
  • Generate forwarder if all parameters can't be marshaled in LibraryImport #104246
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • JIT: Add a disabled-by-default implementation of strength reduction #104243
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix potential Debug.Assert in QuicListener #104241
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [RISC-V] JIT: pass structs according to floating-point calling convention properly #104237
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement `Assembly.GetCallingAssembly` for native AOT #104229
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [QUIC] Remove PreviewFeature #104227
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Only build applicable build Tasks when building the repo #104226
    area-Infrastructure
  • Adding support for morphing associative hwintrinsics #104224
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize multicast delegate thunk #104222
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Simplify Emit SignatureHelper WriteSimpleSignature #104220
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, community-contribution
  • Update mono-interp to handle the same Vector.As APIs as mono-jit #104217
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono

Merged

  • Use resumable leaf frames in CET hijack and in GC stress. #104198
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix static-lib AOT Mono builds #103988
    area-Build-mono
  • Block failing Matrix4x4 tests on activeissue #104235
    area-System.Numerics
  • Seal overridden virtual method `SetDefaultFallbacks` #100030
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Fix typo in ComInterfaceInfo.OptionsAreValid #102384
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Simplify JsonSerializer.GetMetadataPropertyName #104244
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Simplify SoundPlayer.ValidateSoundData #104239
    area-Microsoft.Win32
  • Simplify AltSvcHeaderParser.TryReadPercentEncodedAlpnProtocolName #104240
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Ensure rented array is always returned in `Measurement` #104223
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Stack allocate unescaped boxes #103361
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [iOS][HybridGlobalization] Make consistent HybridGlobalization checks #104082
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Improve perf of JsonValue.CreateFromElement by calling ValueKind once #104108
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Added `ReleaseCores` to `BuildEngine` usages that did not have it. #104141
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Extract shared IL pattern analysis to a class #103701
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [ios][HybridGlobalization] Fix default culture #104071
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Enable FEATURE_MULTICASTSTUB_AS_IL for Windows x86 #104192
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution

Updated

  • NonBacktracking Regex optimizations #102655
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Migrate to zlib-ng, part 2: consume it in runtime #102403
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Use RtlDllShutdownInProgress to detect process shutdown on Windows #103877
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [mono] Skip exact interface matches when an interface has variance #103757
    area-VM-meta-mono, runtime-mono
  • Fix type parsing issues in ILLink and ILC #104060
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: Added four SVE `CreateBreak*` APIs #104184
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • [NativeAOT] Adding CET support #102680
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64-mono] Part-1:Add native code emission module for LoongArch64 #103403
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Make GC stress usable with Libraries tests #103738
    test-enhancement, area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix superpmi collect failure for crossgen2 on linux x64. #104181
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2486333 #103583
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Remove uses of CLRJIT_AZ_KEY/clrjit_key1 from SPMI #104164
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource] Tracing out of proc sampling #104134
    area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, community-contribution
  • [wasi] upgrade to WASIp2 #103752
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • Poly fill Index and Range types #104170
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • [HttpClientFactory] Do not log query string by default #103769
    breaking-change, area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 9.0.0
  • STJ: Support serialization callbacks for collection and dictionary types #104120
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Implement `IAlternateEqualityComparer<ReadOnlySpan<char>, string>` on `EqualityComparer<string>.Default` #104202
    area-System.Collections
  • Implement various other simple vector APIs from 93513 #103837
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [ICorProfiler] Add new API to enumerate GC Heap objects #103735
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [cdac] start of Metadata contract; implement GetMethodTableData SOS method #103444
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Support using the system rapidjson to build #101443
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] Add nativeaot support on LoongArch64. #103889
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, arch-loongarch64
  • Xml serializer test updates prep for reflection work #104173
    area-Serialization
  • Optimize VectorX<T>.ConditionalSelect for constant masks #104092
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V][LoongArch64] New passing info for floating-point structs #103945
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • Change temporary entrypoints to be lazily allocated #101580
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: Unify LSRA call arg building #104051
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Use bitshift instead of multiply in Unsafe.Add intrinsic if possible #103775
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Optimize 'x & cns == cns' pattern #103868
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add draft of runtime async ECMA-335 changes #104063
    area-Meta
  • Optimize BigInteger.Parse #97589
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Make all of the trimmer aware of recursive interfaces #103317
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Update docs for ByRefLike with generics for work in .NET 10 #103318
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Clean up JSON property lookup logic and add alternate key lookup support. #103836
    area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • Add support for `SwiftIndirectResult` in Mono JIT and Interpreter #104111
    area-Codegen-meta-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Optimize Vector128<long> multiplication for arm64 #104177
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Integrate SimdUnicode for AVX-512 #104199
    area-System.Text.Encoding, 9.0.0
  • JIT: ARM64 - Added SVE APIs `ExtractLastVector`, `ExtractLastScalar`, `ExtractAfterLastVector`, `ExtractAfterLastScalar` #103847
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • JIT: don't reorder blocks early #104213
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Normalize the creation of simd comparison nodes and give basic constant folding support #104215
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Have morph normalize patterns to GT_NEG and GT_NOT #104214
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Fix System.Net.Sockets.Tests on Qemu #104094
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add Sve.ConditionalExtract* APIs #104150
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [RISC-V] Fix coreclr test readytorun/coreroot_determinism/coreroot_de… #104140
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Disallow not useful configuration combinations #104149
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Chained comparison of two integers against a constant is not coalesced #102103
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] emscripten bump 3.1.56 #100334
    area-Build-mono
  • Avoid scanning typeof checks when building whole program view #103883
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [H/3] Wait for `WritesClosed` and `Dispose` as fire-and-forget #104035
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [draft] testing memory stats of FF in helix #104152
    arch-wasm, area-GC-mono, 9.0.0
  • UnixCommandLinePing.cs: improve searching for the system ping binary #103838
    area-System.Net, os-linux, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] Part-2:Add runtime assembly code (*.S) files in nativeaot. #104084
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, arch-loongarch64
  • Add randomized allocation sampling #100356
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT][hybridglobalization] Run `HybridGlobalization` threading tests #102595
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, os-browser
  • Ensure mini-amd64 correctly handles CMP_GT and CMP_GE for OP_XCOMPARE_FP #104206
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
